Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Aerotaur::
       He shakes himself out of his daze at the sound of Windlord's voice.  
"Hmm...  the first symptoms..."  He starts heading back toward the quarentine 
chambers while thinking to himself.  He finally remembers the symptoms just 
before he arrives.  "The first symptoms are system anomalies.  They start 
small and grow worse.  After that it's less than a year before death."  His 
face is grim as he looks through the observation window at his friend.

--part1_48.19b75154.2ba54fff_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
